official.headline: Order Maintained Citywide
official.anchor_line: City services remain operational as authorities reinforce stability in all districts.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd demonstrates resilience, keeping essential functions uninterrupted amid external disruptions.

official.headline: Citizen Inquiry Convened
official.anchor_line: A representative tribunal is formed to review governance systems with broad civic participation.
official.contextual_reframing: Structured engagement empowers citizens to contribute constructively, highlighting transparency and systemic adaptability.

official.headline: Directorate Cedes Control
official.anchor_line: In response to new evidence, the Directorate steps aside as the city conducts a full systems review.
official.contextual_reframing: This transition illustrates the integrity of self-correcting safeguards, ensuring Stenograd's future remains secure and accountable.

underground.headline: Secrets Dragged Into Light
underground.anchor_line: Halden’s failsafe drops Directorate files—the ones we were never supposed to see.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real stories and hidden abuses spill out. Every citizen can judge the cost of obedience now.

underground.headline: Citizens Take the Mic
underground.anchor_line: Ordinary people and exiles demand answers in the open tribunal—no filter, no scripts.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more pretense. Survivors, whistleblowers and skeptics retell what the Council erased. This is accountability—finally.

underground.headline: Directorate Falls—System On Trial
underground.anchor_line: After brutal crackdowns and leaked horrors, the Directorate is outed, routed, and gone. Stenograd puts the BCI itself on trial.
underground.contextual_reframing: Everyone sees the proof at last. The system’s darkest secrets are on display—judged by us, not by an algorithm.
